p: The crystal structures of the obtained CuO products were analyzed through the XRD patterns in Figure 1a. All the reflection peaks could be completely indexed as well-crystalline, monoclinic CuO, which was in good agreement with literature values (JCPDS file no. 48-1548). As shown in Figure 1a, no characteristic peaks from unreacted starting materials or initially synthesized Cu(OH) 2 precursors were detected on the XRD patterns of the products, indicating that all samples obtained were single-phase CuO.
